level.heading: Action on plan of merger by constituent limited partnership.

level.text: Subject to § 29-710.06, a plan of merger shall be consented to by all the partners of a constituent limited partnership.

Subject to § 29-710.06 and any contractual rights, after a merger is approved, and at any time before a filing is made under § 29-710.04, a constituent limited partnership may amend the plan or abandon the planned merger:
As provided in the plan; and
Except as prohibited by the plan, with the same consent as was required to approve the plan.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1107 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act).
